BEBaseFoundation.stf_NavTitle: Case Study - Discover the Coast and Hinterland
BEBaseFoundation.stf_PageTitle: Case Study - Discover the Coast and Hinterland

BEGenericHeaderAndConentBody.txt_HTML:
Day 1: Head to the beautiful Sunshine Coast Hinterland to feast on a luncheon of fresh local seafood and Australian wine before a 180 degree view of the surrounding Glasshouse Mountains. Cross the spectacular Blackall Mountain range to the delightful hillside village of Montville for shopping and afternoon tea. After checking into your hotel, take part in a cooking demonstration, followed by a seven course degustation dinner.

Day 2: Start the day with Tai Chi on beach followed by a scrumptious breakfast, then transfer to the stunning hinterland property, Spices Clovelly, for a fun, educational and interactive cooking class. Team your culinary efforts with Australian wine for lunch. After a relaxing afternoon - a spa treatment or round of golf - prepare for your evening event, a four course dinner at a beautiful rural homestead. After dinner an astronomer will explain the southern sky to you as you listen to talented local musicians.

Day 3: Take to the skies! A helicopter will take you to a beautiful hinterland location near Eumundi, where local producers will tantalise your tastebuds at breakfast. Head to the famous Eumundi Markets before boarding Harley Davidsons for a ride back to an award-winning Noosa restaurant for a late lunch overlooking Main Beach before you head home.
